concept.title: Advanced Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom properties to pass Kafka configuration properties that you want to use.

conbody.p: When you add the Kafka configuration property, enter the Kafka property name and the value. The Kafka Consumer does not validate the property names or values.

p.note:
The Kafka Consumer uses the following Kafka configuration properties. If you add these properties, they do not override the values used by the Kafka Consumer:
auto.commit.enable
group.id
zookeeper.connect
